docs.snippet: "I love FIFA," says Jerome Champagne. It sounds incongruous, almost tone-deaf and foolhardy, for anyone to say such a thing when the reputation of football's governing body is in the gutter and when many Brazilians no longer want its World Cup, re...
docs.lead_paragraph: "I love FIFA," says Jerome Champagne. It sounds incongruous, almost tone-deaf and foolhardy, for anyone to say such a thing when the reputation of football's governing body is in the gutter and when many Brazilians no longer want its World Cup, revolted by the monster fuss and expenditure.

headline.main: Blatter's Challenger: Broad Views but a FIFA Man
headline.print_headline: Blatter's Challenger: Broad Views but a FIFA Man
